body: The deck editor remembers the last loaded deck and attempts to restore it the next time you open the deck editor. If for some reason the deck becomes invalid (eg. the dec file is edited (incorrectly) outside of Magarena) then it will prevent the deck editor from loading.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Invalid deck prevents the deck editor from opening.

comments.body:
fixed in https://bitbucket.org/lodici/magarena/commits/aa02b0c6baca9f5b4829f2b951d68d3afbd437c9 .

If deck is invalid then just ignores it and loads deck editor with empty deck. The deck will be flagged as invalid in the Decks screen and cannot be selected.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 27, 2014 15:10:12_

The deck editor remembers the last loaded deck and attempts to restore it the next time you open the deck editor. If for some reason the deck becomes invalid (eg. the dec file is edited (incorrectly) outside of Magarena) then it will prevent the deck editor from loading.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=625_
